verses.verse: אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> Man יְל֣וּד <S%H3205><s%> [that is] born אִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> of a woman קְצַ֥ר <S%H7116><s%> [is] of few יָ֝מִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days וּֽשְׂבַֽע־ <S%H7646><s%> have enough רֹֽגֶז׃ <S%H7267><s%> of trouble

כְּצִ֣יץ <S%H6731><s%> like a flower יָ֭צָא <S%H3318><s%> He cometh forth וַיִּמָּ֑ל <S%H5243><s%> and is cut down וַיִּבְרַ֥ח <S%H1272><s%> he fleeth כַּ֝צֵּ֗ל <S%H6738><s%> also as a shadow וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not יַעֲמֽוֹד׃ <S%H5975><s%> and continueth אַף־ <S%H637><s%> yet עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon

זֶ֭ה <S%H2088><s%> upon such an one פָּקַ֣חְתָּ <S%H6491><s%> And dost thou open עֵינֶ֑ךָ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes וְאֹ֘תִ֤י <S%H853><s%> תָבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> and bringest בְמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <S%H4941><s%> me into judgment עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with
מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Who can bring טָ֭הוֹר <S%H2889><s%> a clean מִטָּמֵ֗א <S%H2931><s%> defiled לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> one

אִ֥ם <S%H518><s%> Seeing חֲרוּצִ֨ים ׀ <S%H2782><s%> [are] determined יָמָ֗יו <S%H3117><s%> his days מִֽסְפַּר־ <S%H4557><s%> the number חֳדָשָׁ֥יו <S%H2320><s%> of his months אִתָּ֑ךְ <S%H854><s%> for [חֻקֹּו כ] (חֻקָּ֥יו <S%H2706><s%> appointed ק) עָ֝שִׂ֗יתָ <S%H6213><s%> [are] with thee thou hast appointed וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יַעֲבֽוֹר׃ <S%H5674><s%> that he cannot pass

שְׁעֵ֣ה <S%H8159><s%> Turn מֵעָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְיֶחְדָּ֑ל <S%H2308><s%> from him that he may rest עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until יִ֝רְצֶ֗ה <S%H7521><s%> till he shall accomplish כְּשָׂכִ֥יר <S%H7916><s%> as an hireling יוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H3117><s%> his day

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For יֵ֥שׁ <S%H3426><s%> For there is לָעֵ֗ץ <S%H6086><s%> of a tree תִּ֫קְוָ֥ה <S%H8615><s%> hope אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> When יִ֭כָּרֵת <S%H3772><s%> if it be cut down וְע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again יַחֲלִ֑יף <S%H2498><s%> that it will sprout again וְ֝יֹֽנַקְתּ֗וֹ <S%H3127><s%> and that the tender branch לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> will not תֶחְדָּֽל׃ <S%H2308><s%> thereof will not cease

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though יַזְקִ֣ין <S%H2204><s%> thereof wax old בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth שָׁרְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H8328><s%> Though the root וּ֝בֶעָפָ֗ר <S%H6083><s%> in the ground יָמ֥וּת <S%H4191><s%> thereof die גִּזְעֽוֹ׃ <S%H1503><s%> and the stock

מֵרֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> [Yet] through the scent מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> of water יַפְרִ֑חַ <S%H6524><s%> it will bud וְעָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and bring forth קָצִ֣יר <S%H7105><s%> boughs כְּמוֹ־ <S%H3644><s%> like נָֽטַע׃ <S%H5194><s%> like a plant

וְגֶ֣בֶר <S%H1397><s%> But man יָ֭מוּת <S%H4191><s%> dieth וַֽיֶּחֱלָ֑שׁ <S%H2522><s%> and wasteth away וַיִּגְוַ֖ע <S%H1478><s%> giveth up the ghost אָדָ֣ם <S%H120><s%> yea man וְאַיּֽוֹ׃ <S%H346><s%> where

אָֽזְלוּ־ <S%H235><s%> fail מַ֭יִם <S%H4325><s%> [As] the waters מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> from יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> from the sea וְ֝נָהָ֗ר <S%H5104><s%> and the flood יֶחֱרַ֥ב <S%H2717><s%> decayeth וְיָבֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H3001><s%> and drieth up

וְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> So man שָׁכַ֗ב <S%H7901><s%> lieth down וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יָ֫ק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> and riseth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until בִּלְתִּ֣י <S%H1115><s%> [be] no more שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> not till the heavens לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יָקִ֑יצוּ <S%H6974><s%> they shall not awake וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יֵ֝עֹ֗רוּ <S%H5782><s%> nor be raised out מִשְּׁנָתָֽם׃ <S%H8142><s%> of their sleep

מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> O יִתֵּ֨ן ׀ <S%H5414><s%> O that בִּשְׁא֬וֹל <S%H7585><s%> me in the grave תַּצְפִּנֵ֗נִי <S%H6845><s%> thou wouldest hide תַּ֭סְתִּירֵנִי <S%H5641><s%> that thou wouldest keep me secret עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until שׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> be past אַפֶּ֑ךָ <S%H639><s%> until thy wrath תָּ֤שִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> that thou wouldest appoint לִ֖י חֹ֣ק <S%H2706><s%> me a set time וְתִזְכְּרֵֽנִי׃ <S%H2142><s%> and remember

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יָמ֥וּת <S%H4191><s%> die גֶּ֗בֶר <S%H1397><s%> If a man הֲיִ֫חְיֶ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> shall he live כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> [again]? all the days צְבָאִ֣י <S%H6635><s%> of my appointed time אֲיַחֵ֑ל <S%H3176><s%> will I wait עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until בּ֝֗וֹא <S%H935><s%> come חֲלִיפָתִֽי׃ <S%H2487><s%> till my change

תִּ֭קְרָא <S%H7121><s%> Thou shalt call וְאָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> and I אֶֽעֱנֶ֑ךָּ <S%H6030><s%> and I will answer לְֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> to the work יָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H3027><s%> of thine hands תִכְסֹֽף׃ <S%H3700><s%> thee thou wilt have a desire

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For עַ֭תָּה <S%H6258><s%> now צְעָדַ֣י <S%H6806><s%> my steps תִּסְפּ֑וֹר <S%H5608><s%> For now thou numberest לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תִ֝שְׁמ֗וֹר <S%H8104><s%> dost thou not watch עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and חַטָּאתִֽי׃ <S%H2403><s%> my sin

חָתֻ֣ם <S%H2856><s%> [is] sealed up בִּצְר֣וֹר <S%H6872><s%> in a bag פִּשְׁעִ֑י <S%H6588><s%> My transgression וַ֝תִּטְפֹּ֗ל <S%H2950><s%> and thou sewest up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> up עֲוֹנִֽי׃ <S%H5771><s%> mine iniquity

וְ֭אוּלָם <S%H199><s%> And surely הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> the mountain נוֹפֵ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> falling יִבּ֑וֹל <S%H5034><s%> cometh to nought וְ֝צ֗וּר <S%H6697><s%> and the rock יֶעְתַּ֥ק <S%H6275><s%> is removed מִמְּקֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H4725><s%> out of his place

אֲבָנִ֤ים ׀ <S%H68><s%> the stones שָׁ֥חֲקוּ <S%H7833><s%> wear מַ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> The waters תִּשְׁטֹֽף־ <S%H7857><s%> thou washest away סְפִיחֶ֥יהָ <S%H5599><s%> the things which grow עֲפַר־ <S%H6083><s%> [out] of the dust אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth וְתִקְוַ֖ת <S%H8615><s%> the hope אֱנ֣וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> of man הֶאֱבַֽדְתָּ׃ <S%H6><s%> and thou destroyest

תִּתְקְפֵ֣הוּ <S%H8630><s%> Thou prevailest לָ֭נֶצַח <S%H5331><s%> for ever וַֽיַּהֲלֹ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> against him and he passeth מְשַׁנֶּ֥ה <S%H8138><s%> thou changest פָ֝נָ֗יו <S%H6440><s%> his countenance וַֽתְּשַׁלְּחֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7971><s%> and sendest him away

יִכְבְּד֣וּ <S%H3513><s%> come to honour בָ֭נָיו <S%H1121><s%> His sons וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> does not יֵדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> and he knoweth וְ֝יִצְעֲר֗וּ <S%H6819><s%> [it] not and they are brought low וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יָבִ֥ין <S%H995><s%> but he perceiveth לָֽמוֹ׃

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> but בְּ֭שָׂרוֹ <S%H1320><s%> But his flesh עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> and יִכְאָ֑ב <S%H3510><s%> upon him shall have pain וְ֝נַפְשׁ֗וֹ <S%H5315><s%> and his soul עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> and he תֶּאֱבָֽל׃ <S%H56><s%> within him shall mourn פ
